channel.title: Guru Poornima
channel.itunes:author: Swami Guruparananda
channel.itunes:subtitle: Vedanta talks in Tamil
channel.itunes:summary:
Rishi Veda Vyasa was born on this auspicious day. Guru Poornima is celebrated as a mark of respect to Vyasacharya and to the entire guru parampara. The significance of Guru Poornima is explained in this talk.
The entire collection of Swamiji's talks is available at the Poornalayam website.
